title: What is the Advanced Course on Ecstasy and Non Verbal Hypnotism and how can it benefit therapy?

The course teaches the basis of non-verbal therapy through which regression can be done in an evocative way using non-verbal communication. The text then dives deeper into two techniques - Taurus and Magnetic ecstasy - that can create deep hypnosis and a physio-psychological state. In this part of the text, the author explains what Magnetic ecstasy is, its history and use in therapy, and how to induce ecstasy.

last_phrase: In conclusion, the exercises and techniques mentioned above are designed to help individuals develop and experience ecstasy, increase magnetism, and enhance their communication skills to improve their therapy sessions.
